title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: LTC Surges 16.7% as All Assets Trade Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Polkadot (DOT) joined Litecoin (LTC) as a top performer, gaining 4.8% from Wednesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3829.35, up 1.8% (+68.29) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

Twenty of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: LTC (+16.7%) and DOT (+4.8%).

Laggards: XRP (+0.1%) and XLM (+0.5%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The news reports that all 20 assets in the CoinDesk 20 Index are trading higher with significant gains for top performers like LTC (+16.7%) and DOT (+4.8%).
